General.Name: Mindset Pharma Inc
General.Description: Mindset Pharma Inc. develops and sells psychedelic medicines to treat neurological and psychiatric disorders in Canada. It focuses on developing MSP-1014, a psychedelic drug candidate. The company is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 217 Queen Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5V 0R2

2.Title: Chief Scientific Officer, Member of Scientific Advisory Board & Director
